Name: Black Diamond #2
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
RIM glass with smoked cinnamon (moisten outside edge with orange juice and dip into cinnamon).
Review: Cognac, vermouth and elderflower liqueur combine harmoniously in this short, boozy cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Pablo Ayos at Ibiza Bartenders Bar School in Ibiza, Spain. Pablo's recipe originally called for ¾ shot Dos Deus Vermouth.
Nutrition: One serving of Black Diamond #2 contains 155 calories
